headline: Ask HN: Who is working on collective intelligence systems?
description:
Which problems of the big picture are you approaching? And how are you approaching them?

I'm active in the canonical debate lab where we research on scalable collaborative argument mapping, voting systems, community moderation, truth algorithms and social protocols.

We'd like so see and motivate a bit more activity in this field.

Recently we tried to identify the main challenges and write them down. Here is the result: https://canonicaldebatelab.com/CIDesign/
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 谁在从事集体情报系统的工作？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 誰在從事集體情報系統的工作？
description_zh-Hans:
你正在接近大环境中的哪些问题？你是如何处理这些问题的？

我在经典辩论实验室工作，我们研究可扩展的协作式论证图、投票系统、社区管理、真相算法和社会协议。

我们希望在这个领域看到并激励更多活动。以下是结果：https://canonicaldebatelab.com/CIDesign/
description_zh-Hant:
你正在接近大環境中的哪些問題？你是如何處理這些問題的？

我在經典辯論實驗室工作，我們研究可擴展的協作式論證圖、投票系統、社區管理、真相算法和社會協議。

我們希望在這個領域看到並激勵更多活動。以下是結果：https://canonicaldebatelab.com/CIDesign/
